Jean Dujardin gets Connery's mannerisms down pat: the adjusting the cuff links when entering a club as all the women turn to admire him, smiling to each and every one as though they had been waiting for hours for his arrival. He has masterfully portrayed three different (useful) types of appreciation and they are not necessarily what you would expect them to be, particular in scene 5. One can only hope Bond fans will appreciate it as well.
